TravelerSTSMod:BookAndQuill.NAME: Book And Pen
TravelerSTSMod:BookAndQuill.FLAVOR: Write down the stories on the journey automatically.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you enter a room, gain #b1 #ytravelerstsmod:Ink.

TravelerSTSMod:BlankMovement.NAME: Blank Movement
TravelerSTSMod:BlankMovement.FLAVOR: Touching it makes disturbing sounds while there's nothing on the staff.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, Apply #b8 #ytravelerstsmod:Whispers to ALL enemies.

TravelerSTSMod:MobiusBand.NAME: Mobius Band
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, if #ytravelerstsmod:Verses you have are not less than #b4, gain [E] at the start of next turn.

TravelerSTSMod:AbyssInkBottle.NAME: Abyss Ink Bottle
TravelerSTSMod:AbyssInkBottle.FLAVOR: You may offer your blood to get inexhaustible supply of Ink.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever there's a need to consume #ytravelerstsmod:Ink and you don't have enough #yInk, consume #b1 HP for each #yInk missing.

TravelerSTSMod:SpellDictionary.NAME: Dictionary Of Spells
TravelerSTSMod:SpellDictionary.FLAVOR: It has the records of ancient magics that existed hundreds of years ago.
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose #b1 of #b3 random Spells and add it to your hand at the start of each combat. The Spell costs #y0 that turn.

TravelerSTSMod:BloodSeeker.NAME: Blood Seeker
TravelerSTSMod:BloodSeeker.FLAVOR: Creatures come from another dimension. It's hard to say since when they have appeared in clusters in the spire.

TravelerSTSMod:InkHourglass.NAME: Hourglass Of Ink
TravelerSTSMod:InkHourglass.FLAVOR: So thick that it takes ten hours for a drop to fall.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever travelerstsmod:Verse reaches 5 stacks, deal 5 damage to ALL enemies.

TravelerSTSMod:Trinity.NAME: Trinity
TravelerSTSMod:Trinity.FLAVOR: The other two are telling you something.
DESCRIPTIONS: Apply #b3 #ytravelerstsmod:Whispers to ALL enemies for every #b3 #yPersonalities you play.

TravelerSTSMod:SoulVessel.NAME: Soul Container
TravelerSTSMod:SoulVessel.FLAVOR: Stores half of memories, a third of personality, a quarter of emotions and a name.

TravelerSTSMod:Phonograph.NAME: The Phonograph
TravelerSTSMod:Phonograph.FLAVOR: It's a pity that you don't have any record to play.
DESCRIPTIONS: #ytravelerstsmod:Whispers is reduced by half instead of ALL at the start of the owner's turn.

TravelerSTSMod:Inferno.NAME: Inferno Flame
TravelerSTSMod:Inferno.FLAVOR: Looks like fire but it's such cold.
DESCRIPTIONS: Set the cost of a random card to #b0 at the start of each combat.

TravelerSTSMod:CrystalFromAbyss.NAME: Abyssal Crystal
TravelerSTSMod:CrystalFromAbyss.FLAVOR: One may face many horrible faces through the translucent crystal.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, you can discard #b1 card in hand and deal #b6 damage to ALL enemies.
